pkgmetadata.longdescription: .. warning:: This is work in progress, installing with 'pip' is not supported at this point. If you're looking for python scripts to automate the LFS (`Linux From Scratch`_) build, please see `github.com/joaomdsc/pkg`_.Documentation for this software can be found on `pkg.readthedocs.io`_... _Linux From Scratch: http://www.linuxfromscratch.org/.. _github.com/joaomdsc/pkg: https://github.com/joaomdsc/pkg.. _pkg.readthedocs.io: https://pkg.readthedocs.io
